question.text: Which of the following statements are true regarding the hypothalamus?

options.text: It is situated at the base of rhombencephalon.
It has centres for breathing and respiration.
It has centres which control body temperature, urge for eating and drinking.
It is connected to the posterior pituitary with hypothalamo-hypophyseal portal system.

solution.text: The hypothalamus has centres which control body temperature and the urge for eating and drinking. It is a part of forebrain and diencephalon. It is connected to the anterior pituitary with hypothalamo-hypophyseal portal system. The centres for breathing and respiration are present in pons and medulla.
